summary.risk_overview: The repository lacks several fundamental security controls and contains vulnerabilities that could lead to unauthorized access and data exposure. Immediate attention is required to address these issues.

findings.title: Hardcoded API Key
findings.impact: Exposure of API keys can lead to unauthorized access to services.

steps: Remove hardcoded keys from source code.
Use environment variables to manage secrets.

findings.notes: Ensure all secrets are rotated after removal from the codebase.

findings.title: Missing Authentication Mechanism
findings.evidence: No authentication implementation found in src/auth/
findings.impact: Without authentication, unauthorized users can access the application.

steps: Implement an authentication mechanism using OAuth or JWT.
fix.secure_example: Implement OAuth2.0 with a library like Passport.js.

findings.title: No Rate Limiting Implemented
findings.evidence: No rate limiting found in server configurations.
findings.impact: Lack of rate limiting can lead to denial of service attacks.

steps: Implement rate limiting using middleware like express-rate-limit.

findings.notes: Consider different limits for different endpoints.

findings.title: Missing Security Headers
findings.evidence: No security headers set in HTTP responses.
findings.impact: Absence of security headers increases the risk of attacks like XSS and clickjacking.

steps: Add security headers using helmet middleware.

findings.notes: Ensure CSP, HSTS, and X-Frame-Options are configured.

findings.title: Outdated Dependencies
findings.impact: Outdated dependencies may contain known vulnerabilities.

steps: Update 'react' to the latest stable version.

findings.notes: Regularly check for updates using npm audit.

findings.title: Missing Authentication

findings.impact: Application lacks authentication which is a fundamental security control

findings.title: Missing Authorization
findings.evidence: No authorization framework found in No relevant files found

findings.evidence: No rate limiting implementation found in No relevant files found

findings.title: Missing Security Headers
findings.evidence: No security headers configuration found in tsconfig.node.json, tsconfig.app.json, tailwind.config.ts
findings.impact: Application lacks security headers which is a fundamental security control

findings.title: Missing Audit Logging
findings.evidence: No audit logging implementation found in src/components/WorldSeedingDialog.tsx, src/components/ui/alert-dialog.tsx, src/components/ui/dialog.tsx
findings.impact: Application lacks audit logging which is a fundamental security control

baseline_checklist.justification: No authentication mechanism found in the codebase.
No rate limiting implemented in server configurations.
No security headers set in HTTP responses.
No audit logging mechanism found in the application.

checks_omitted: Full code review for business logic vulnerabilities due to time constraints.
